channel.title: New client
channel.description:
Been messing around with clients lately again then started to make one for a server named Caliscape. Releasing a version of the client I made, slightly different from that of which I made for Caliscape. The new client has the custom text interface I posted in the show-off forum that some of you might have already seen minus the paste feature.
New login background, New font, Chatbot with random chat "help" messages which can be edited, Text colour toggle, Text effect toggle, Chatbot toggle, Mp3 player in jframe, Redstones fixed, Perfect sideicon clicking, Perfect 417 Gameframe, Theme colour editor, Jbuttons with links and server configuration, Jframe Censor, Moderator+ only right click xteleto and xteletome, Item, Object and Npc ID lists, Moderator+ only teleports and Noclip (JFrame), Co-ord interface, Fps Interface, Tabbed Console, Client sided interface and more!
Can't be arsed with many pictures so I'm only posting the one, download if you want to see it more.
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/207tbav.png[/img]
Here's the download link: [url=http://uppit.com/13FXJ1]http://uppit.com/13FXJ1[/url]
Credits:
Shane for the Background. <3 Myself. Everyone who contributed in anyway or form (can't be bothered to list).

item.title: New client

item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Good because that’s about the only thing that brings this client down, along with the JFrame theme.

Read full topic

item.title: New client
item.dc:creator: @webber webber
item.description:
@webber wrote:

Primadude, I’m actually getting the person who made the Background to make it Blue/white instead of having the old styled television theme.

Read full topic

item.title: New client
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Background could use a bit of colour, and the Game Frame is quite a dull colour. The other features are nice, but the overall colours of the client are a bit grim :/.

Read full topic

item.title: New client
item.dc:creator: @webber webber
item.description:
@webber wrote:

[quote=“project courage, post:1, topic:270182”]This looks very good! some of your best work, although i think i have seen the unique login buttons(that are no longer unique, due to pathetic leechers, calling it their own) i like the JFrame especially customised music playing tabs make it easier to access the MP3 player, and separate tabs for links to other sites and affiliates, but also i like the custom right-click feature where mods only can use the xteletome.

P.s. i shall be basing my next client on this, and also Rep++ for your hard work.[/quote]

Thanks, as for the login page. Webber’s Client v1 was the first client to ever released client to have this.

Read full topic

item.title: New client
item.dc:creator: @Chris_GD Chris GD
item.description:
@Chris_GD wrote:

Great job on the client,
Love all your work, keep it up.

Chris GD

Read full topic
